title: Commission Regulation (EEC) No 537/93 of 9 March 1993 fixing the coefficient reducing agricultural prices applicable from the beginning of the 1993/94 marketing year
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EEC) No 537/93 of 9 March 1993 fixing the coefficient reducing agricultual prices applicable from the beginning of the 1993/94 marketing year
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body:
The coefficient for reducing agricultural prices to be applied in accordance with Article 9 of Regulation (EEC) No 3813/92 is hereby fixed at:
- 1,010078 for prices and amounts in the fruit and vegetable and olive oil sectors adjusted by the coefficient of 1,002650 in 1992,
- 1,002159 for prices and amounts in the fruit and vegetable, sheepmeat and goatmeat and fishery product sectors adjusted by the coefficient of 1,010561 in 1993,
- 1,012674 for the other prices and amounts concerned.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the day of its publication in the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 9 March 1993.
For the Commission
RenĂŠ STEICHEN
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 387, 31. 12. 1992, p. 1.
(2) OJ No L 344, 21. 11. 1992, p. 27.
(3) OJ No L 26, 3. 2. 1993, p. 13.
